summary: Static HTML website about perfumes (all types) with detailed descriptions and reviews across 4–5 pages.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Elegant perfume bottle hero banner on a marble vanity with soft warm lighting (perfume-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of 6 minimalist line icons related to fragrance notes (flower, citrus, wood, amber, vanilla, musk) on transparent background (note-icons.dim_512x512.png)
- Abstract fragrance mist background texture with subtle gradients (fragrance-mist-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a static 4–5 page website about perfumes (all types) with clear navigation between pages.
Add a Home page that introduces perfumes and explains how the site is organized (types, notes, concentration, and reviews).

Add a “Perfume Types & Guide” page with detailed explanations covering common fragrance families (e.g., floral, woody, oriental/amber, fresh/citrus, gourmand), note structure (top/middle/base), and concentration levels (EDT/EDP/Parfum/Cologne).
Add a “Reviews” page containing multiple detailed sample perfume reviews presented in a consistent format (overview, scent profile, longevity, sillage, season/occasion, pros/cons, rating).
Add one additional page (either “Top Picks & Brands” or “About / Contact”) to reach a total of 4–5 pages, with detailed static content relevant to perfumes.
Apply a coherent, creative visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, layout) suitable for a premium perfume editorial website and use it consistently across all pages.
Generate and include required static images in the frontend public assets folder and render them in the UI (hero/headers and section accents) without routing images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a 4–5 page static HTML website about perfumes (all types) including detailed descriptions and reviews.
